hymn.title: Nor silver nor gold hath obtained my redemption
hymn.category: Assurance and Joy of Salvation—Redeemed by the Blood

layout.singingstanza: Nor sil -- ver nor gold hath ob -- tained my re -- demp -- tion; No rich -- es of earth could have saved my poor soul. The blood of the cross is my on -- ly foun -- da -- tion; The death of my Sav -- ior now mak -- eth me whole. I am re -- deemed, but not with sil -- ver; I am bought, but not with gold; Bought with a price— the blood of Je -- sus, Pre -- cious price of love un -- told.
